name: WeezyVR
summary:
Weezy VR means travel in Virtual Reality.
Go on virtual trips in destinations of your choosing.
Find and explore destinations with simple filters, and pick and choose your favourite hotels, then book them to explore in real life!

Join us on a trip to the top of the Eiffel Tower, ballooning in a Ugandan safari park or lie down and relax on the white beaches of the Dominican Republic - all from the comfort of your own home.

Through our comprehensive booking system, you can try your destinations before...
